articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Taiwan Conducts Massive Military Drills, Anti-Submarine Operations As It Prepares To Thwart Chinese PLAN - EurAsian Times
articles.description: In line with its military preparations to thwart any potential invasion attempt by China, the Taiwanese military launched a two-day military drill at sea, on land, and in the air on January 30. On day one, in a stunning display of its air power, Taiwan’s air …
articles.content:
In line with its military preparations to thwart any potential invasion attempt by China, the Taiwanese military launched a two-day military drill at sea, on land, and in the air on January 30.
